entity.description: Comprehensive testing approach for DOTS Family Mode including unit testing, integration testing, eBPF testing, and quality assurance based on existing test infrastructure

requirements.description: All public functions must have unit tests, use #[cfg(test)] modules, implement proper test data setup/teardown, mock external dependencies, achieve >80% code coverage, and run via 'cargo test --workspace'
requirements.title: Unit Testing Requirements

requirements.description: Create tests/ directories for integration tests, test component interactions (daemon-monitor DBus communication), test database operations with real SQLite, test eBPF program loading and data flow, and run via test scripts
requirements.title: Integration Testing Requirements

requirements.description: Test eBPF programs with simulated kernel events, validate eBPF program loading and unloading, test userspace-kernel communication, handle eBPF permission requirements (may fail in development), and mock eBPF data when kernel features unavailable
requirements.title: eBPF Testing Strategy

requirements.description: Use scripts/test_full_system.sh for complete system validation, test daemon startup and service registration, validate monitor-daemon communication, test CLI operations against running daemon, and verify systemd integration in appropriate environments
requirements.title: End-to-End Testing Requirements

requirements.description: All tests must pass before merge, zero clippy warnings required, security audit with cargo-deny must pass, code coverage reports generated with tarpaulin, performance benchmarks for critical paths, and integration with GitHub Actions CI
requirements.title: Quality Assurance Gates

entity.title: Testing Strategy Framework
